definition: Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat

sentences.english: The Nadam Festival is a traditional occasion for Mongols to get together for a few days of festivity .
sentences.chinese: 傳統地，蒙古國人民在那達慕節要聚集歡宴幾天。

sentences.english: Following the fall of the Soviet Union, Mongolia adopted electoral politics.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古國在蘇聯解體後實施選舉政治制度。

sentences.english: This year the firm entered the Balkans and Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 今年，該公司進駐巴爾幹半島各國和蒙古國。

sentences.english: Mongolia is split in to 21 provinces (aimag).
The Mongolian heartland consists of relatively flat steppes.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古國的心臟地帶是相對平穩的乾草原。

sentences.english: There he established a fresh Mongol state called the Kingdom of the Great Mughals .
sentences.chinese: 他在那裏建立了一個叫大莫臥兒王國的新蒙古國。

sentences.english: Mr. Biden departs on Monday for Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 拜登將於下週一結束訪華，前往蒙古國。

sentences.english: An aerial view of Ulan Bator's Sukhbaatar Square shows the Mongolian Parliament.
sentences.chinese: 烏蘭巴托蘇赫巴託廣場的鳥瞰圖，展示了蒙古國會。

sentences.english: ALLEN I'm wanted for pederasty in Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 我因孌童而在蒙古國遭到通緝。

definition: Inner Mongolia autonomous region, abbr. 內蒙古|内蒙古[Nei4 meng3 gu3], capital Hohhot 呼和浩特市[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4 Shi4]
pinyin: Nei4 meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 qu1
Wu1 zi1 bie2 ke4 si1 tan3
Ji2 er3 ji2 si1 si1 tan3
